abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Step forward dealing 113 damage and Slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Condemn
abilities.description: After 1 second, Johanna pulls nearby enemies toward her, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 damage. Deals 200% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

abilities.name: Shield Glare
abilities.description: Deal 59 damage to enemies and Blind them for 1.5 seconds.

heroics.name: Falling Sword
heroics.description: Johanna leaps towards an area. While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 183 damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

heroics.name: Blessed Shield
heroics.description: Deal 114 damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

original.name: Johanna
original.title: Crusader of Zakarum
original.description: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.
original.shortDescription: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions. 0 Physical Armor

baseHeroInfo.name: Johanna
baseHeroInfo.title: Crusader of Zakarum
baseHeroInfo.description: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Tank who shines against Physical Attackers and can effectively clear groups of minions. 0 Physical Armor

trait.name: Iron Skin
trait.description: Activate to grant Johanna a Shield that absorbs 674 damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, Johanna is Unstoppable.

skins.name: Crusader of Zakarum
skins.description: There have been many women who have borne the name Johanna in service of the crusade, and each has given her life to purify her faith. Johanna carries on their legacy as she searches the kingdom of Khanduras for the fallen star.

skins.name: Sacred Oath Johanna
skins.description: The crusader's armor is an emblem of their identity. Over the centuries it is constantly molded and reshaped to fit the needs and personality of its current master.

skins.name: Spellbreaker Johanna
skins.description: While most spellbreakers serve in defense of Quelâ€™Thalas, Johanna has embarked on a crusade to purify the lands of Lordaeron, instead. She will not rest until her homeland is restored.

skins.name: Centurion Johanna
skins.description: At Emperor Severus's command, an entire legion marched against the portal of the gods. All but one returned home, a single centurion taken as punishment for man's hubris.
